product_name: Planet Bike Superflash Rear Bike Light
long_description: Superflash(TM) is possibly the brightest bike tail light on the planet! Half-watt Blaze(TM) LED plus two Extreme(TM) LEDs provide visibility up to one mile. Compact vertical design is weatherproof, lightweight and durable. Flashing and steady modes; unique, eye-catching flash pattern. Comes with bike mounts and clip mount. Includes two AAA batteries.
short_description: Superflash(TM) is possibly the brightest bike tail light on the planet!
